teracomix.title: Teracomix
teracomix.description: TeraComix is a K-6 online edutainment webtoon platform providing safe, fun, and curated age-appropriate education-based comic web stories. TeraComix encourages reading, inspires creative thinking, and promotes a creator’s mindset.

pointAvenue.title: Online Learning Courses - Point Avenue
pointAvenue.description: Founded by West Point graduates, Point Avenue aspires to help students achieve academic and lifelong success. Make sure you make that step with the best version of yourself.

AIStudios.title: AI STUDIOS - Text to Video Generation Platform Using AI Avatar.
AIStudios.description: Experience the leading AI Avatar platform. You are free to use your AI avatar without having to worry about copyright. Just prepare a script and create your first AI video in less than 5 minutes.
